assignments.name: Populate_Custom_Error_with_Flow_Fault_Message
assignments.label: Populate Custom Error with Flow Fault Message

formulas.name: frmTextMonth
formulas.expression: CASE( /* get next month number, rolling over after 12 */ IF( MONTH({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) = 12, 1, MONTH({!$Flow.CurrentDate}) + 1 ), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", 12, "December", /* default */ "" )

fields.name: displayError
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong....


Error message:

{!CustomError}

actions.name: AL_Get_Targets_from_input_Metric_Country_and_Period
actions.label: AL - Get Targets from input Metric, Country and Period

fields.name: displayCloneInfo
fields.fieldText: Select Targets to Clone

fields.name: displaySuccessHeader
fields.fieldText: Successfully Created {!Target_Count} Targets
